price: 15. En zij zeggen: “Dit is niets anders dan duidelijke toverkunst!
arabic: وَقَالُوٓاْ إِنۡ هَٰذَآ إِلَّا سِحۡرٞ مُّبِينٌ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: waqālū in hādhā illā siḥ'run mubīnun
